body.p: Some respondents asked the Board to provide guidance on the accounting for guarantees and similar arrangements between the parent and the subsidiary or the non‑controlling interests. They also suggested that the Board should require additional disclosures about inter‑company guarantees and the extent of deficits, if any, of non‑controlling interests.
